landingPage.title: Hi, I am Joel
landingPage.subtitle: A product owner that excels at bridging customers and development teams

aboutMe.title: about me
aboutMe.text:
I'm a product owner bridging the gap between customers and product dev teams. I've got a solid grasp on both business and tech, making me a versatile asset.
I love to listen to customers, understands their needs and transform them into innovative product solutions that just work. 

Cheers.
